Room.Name: Trokkawilff's Stair Landing
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Trokkawilff's stair landing at the head of a winding stairwell.
Room.LongDescription: A wide circular stairway descends deeper into the castle from this point. The stairway is west of here, and directly south is a shimmering darkness in the form of a door. Trokkawilff, the master torturer, lived behind that door over a century ago. His name still brings a shudder to prisoners unlucky enough to be brought down to the prison in these tunnels.
